reviewText: Actually one of the best series ever.  I hope they continue to produce this series and the high values it promotes. Love it.

After watching the first time we watched Heartland on tv were hooked and wanted more.  But we can't always get it on our tv so we purchased it and watch it all the time.  It's such a good family show.

I had the first season of heartland and I watched all of it I then bought the second season and when I began the first disc it showed previews from the last season, What I seen was not anything like season 1 ended The previews I had not seen on Season 1. So I get on the internet and started some searching I found this one part 2 of season 1 .went through my other episodes and found it to be different so................ I ordered it, When I started watching it found out first of all there were only 2 discs to it witch could of been in the other package and second of all after searching it out found out it was all the same episodes there were in season 1 so I don't get why there is a season 1 part 2. So either I missed something along the line or there is another season that I am not finding. I will say I enjoy the show very much and have season 2 and plan to watch that as well even though it does not start were it left off of season 1 I would still recommend people to watch it great senery and a good family show.

The heartland tv series was originally aired in canada and has been released in tv and aired in us recently, and had also been added to Netflix.  This is a nice show for the family, with great horse stories, family, relationships and drama, and still keeps that good for the whole family rating.  If you have read the books as a kid or not this is a tv show that will keep you and your kids interested over and over again.  A great show to watch on family night with something for everyone.
Heartland is a wonderful family film for the whole family, has beautiful scenery, anyone who likes horses, will love this series.
great tv show about horses and good values. I'm waiting for season 2 about season 3 and 4? IDON'T KNOW HIGHLY recommended.

I am a fan of Chris Potter which is why I was interested in this show.  I live in the US so Heartland has not been available here.  When I saw it was on DVD I had to buy it and I am so glad I did.  The show is a really good family show and even if Chris wasn't in it I would be hooked.  I can't wait until season 2 is available in April. If you are a Chris Potter fan, love horses and beautiful scenery you must get this.
